```python
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\sunit\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b|\b\w+\sprocessor\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\slink\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b|\b\w+\sentity\b|\b\w+\sphenomenon\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\ssoftware\b|\b\w+\soperating\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\sneed\b|\b\w+\saim\b|\b\w+\sobjective\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sstate\b|\b\w+\sevent\b|\b\w+\svalue\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    pattern = r'"([^"]+)"'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    entities['Software System'] = matches

    # Physical Device
    pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = matches

    # Environment Object
    pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = matches

    # External System
    pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    entities['External System'] = matches

    # System Requirements
    pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Correlator|EVLA|DigitalHome|Monitor|Control|System|Software|Product|System|Product|Requirements|Use|Case|Model)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|instrument|data|file|set|system|product|system|product|requirements|use|case|model)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|user|client|technical|designer|data|file|set|system|product|system|product|requirements|use|case|model)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk|file|set|system|product|system|product|requirements|use|case|model)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(requirement|aim|purpose|system|product|system|product|requirements|use|case|model)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(event|state|value|shared|phenomena|data|file|set|system|product|system|product|requirements|use|case|model)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system|the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?software|the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system\s+software"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?device|a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?input\s+device|a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?data\s+storage\s+device|a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?hard\s+copy\s+printer"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0].strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?home|the\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?sun|the\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?old|the\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?patient"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0].strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?database|a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?tap|a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?hard\s+disk"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?manage|to\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?output|to\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?transfer|to\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+([A-Z][a-z]+ )?execute"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0].strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ )?requests|([A-Z][a-z]+ )?data|([A-Z][a-z]+ )?imagery|([A-Z][a-z]+ )?parameters"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0].strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Digital Home system, for the purposes of this document, is a system that will allow a home user to manage devices that control the environment of a home."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\s+device\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\s+shall\s+[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\s+shall\s+[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(VLA|Digital|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(tap|hard\ disk|database|magnetic\ stripe\ card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic\ stripe\ card|tap|hard\ disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirements|expectations|recommendations|requirements\ and\ recommendations)\b'
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(software|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match for match in software_system_matches if match not in entities['Software System']]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|computer|machine|equipment|hardware|system|network|server|computer|machine|equipment|hardware|system|network|server)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match for match in physical_device_matches if match not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|environment|situation|context|location|place|area|space|region|zone|area|space|region|zone)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match for match in environment_object_matches if match not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|tap|disk|system|network|server|computer|machine|equipment|hardware|system|network|server)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match for match in external_system_matches if match not in entities['External System']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirement|aim|purpose|goal|objective|functionality|function|functionality|function)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match for match in system_requirements_matches if match not in entities['System Requirements']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(event|state|value|information|data|message|signal|signal|information|data|message|signal)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches if match not in entities['Shared Phenomena']]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a)\s+(CCTNS|Space Fractions|Question Updater|DigitalHome)\s+system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [system[2] for system in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(user|computer|browser|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(user|patient|sun|old|the user|the patient|the sun|the old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the user interface|the application|the browser|the CCTNS system|the Space Fractions system|the Question Updater)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|customise|suitable for users with special needs|compatible with specialist software|perform simple web operations|browsing web pages|submitting information and requests via a web interface|make the user interface more accessible|reside on the Internet|download its content for use on their computer|allow users to customise|employ a graphical user interface)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(a graphical user interface|the Internet|web interface|mouse clicks|simple web operations|web pages|information and requests via a web interface)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+or\s+)?\w+(?:\s+or\s+)?\w+"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"\b\w+(?:\s+the)?\b"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+or\s+)?\w+(?:\s+or\s+)?\w+"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"\b\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+or\s+)?\w+(?:\s+or\s+)?\w+\b"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

    entities = {

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []

    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(System|System\s*)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(device|Device|Device\s*)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0].strip())

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[3].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|Database|card|Card|disk|Disk|tap|Tap|hard|Hard)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(be|have|provide|allow|execute|conduct|perform|display|view|ensure|set|maintain|tailor)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|get|send|receive|use|utilize|access|interact)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|get|send|receive|use|utilize|access|interact)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|get|send|receive|use|utilize|access|interact)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(be|have|provide|allow|execute|conduct|perform|display|view|ensure|set|maintain|tailor)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|get|send|receive|use|utilize|access|interact)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(software|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(high resolution computer|tools|device|system|product)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(technician|operator|owner|individual|patient|sun|old|system|product|user|Engineers|technicians|UAVs|UAV payloads|the system operator|A DigitalHome Technician|DigitalHomeOwner)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(graphical user interface|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Training software|Software tools|the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|the Tactical Control System|DigitalHome system product)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(aim|purpose|functioning properly|inspect and monitor individual CMIB layer devices|fault trace|to ensure that it is functioning properly|allow an Authorized Operator to execute a software debug capability|view the resulting debug diagnostic information|system wide configuration|a low level CMIB command line instruction|limited data exploitation|data receipt|data processing|data dissemination|mission tasking|mission planning|mission execution|computer related communications)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(system wide configuration|a low level CMIB command line instruction|fault trace|tools|the resulting debug diagnostic information|data receipt|data processing|data dissemination|mission tasking|mission planning|mission execution|computer related communications|limited data exploitation)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "A DigitalHome Technician is specially trained by DigitalHomeOwner to be familiar with the functionality, architecture, and operation of the DigitalHome system product."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
```
```python
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bSoftware System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bPhysical Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bEnvironment Object\b',
        'External System': r'\bExternal System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bSystem Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bShared Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = defaultdict(list)

    # Iterate over the tokens and identify the entity types
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.match(pattern, token):
                result[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities in the format of a JSON string
    return {entity_type: entities for entity_type, entities in result.items()}
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)*\w+?(?:\s+system)?"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"\b(?:\w+\s+)*\w+\b"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"\b(?:the\s+)?(?:\w+\s+)*\w+\b"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"\b(?:\w+\s+)*\w+\s+system\b"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(?:\w+\s+)*\w+?"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"\b(?:\w+\s+)*\w+\b"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif token.lower() in ['device', 'hardware', 'controller', 'sensor']:
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif token.lower() in ['user', 'patient', 'sun', 'old']:
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'tap', 'disk']:
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'need', 'purpose']:
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif token.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    return extracted_entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ environment\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "However, the simulated environment will be realistic and adhere to the physical properties and constraints of an actual home and to real sensors and controllers."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']

    # Initialize an empty dictionary to store the extracted entities
    entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in schema}

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = sentence.split()

    # Identify the entity types in the sentence
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type in schema:
            if entity_type in token:
                entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s(UNIX-based|computer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(patient|sun|old|Homeowner Inc.)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|existing systems)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|for)\s(detector|respond|open|customizing|achieving|providing|help)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(event|state|value|choice|process|project)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "Although the system to be developed is a “proof of concept” system intended to help Homeowner Inc."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Processing|System|Correlator|Monitor|Control|Monitor and Control System|DigitalHome|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(video|hard copy|tap|magnetic stripe card|database|hard disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|end user|content|data|information|future technologies|newer technologies|user agents|individuals|projects|requirements|intellectual property|sensitive information|data|video|freeze frame video|hard copy|digital imagery|product)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(formatting|storing|internally routing|recording the video|creating and storing a freeze frame of the video|retrieving and displaying the video|printing a hard copy of freeze frame video|processing digital imagery for export and dissemination|long-term production and marketing|issues|requirements)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(content|data|information|future technologies|newer technologies|user agents|digital imagery|video|freeze frame video|hard copy|product)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|TCP/IP|computer)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|the old)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk|The Question Updater|an Internet Service Provider \(ISP\))'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ skills|the DATEX/ASN data|map images|a project defined protocol)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ skills|the DATEX/ASN data|map images|a project defined protocol)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ computer|any Internet-accessible computer)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(user|the sun|the old|patient)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(web server|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Remotely hosted applications|the defined data server interface)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(web-based displays and information change|communicate in a client server relationhip|requires a web browser capable of running Flash movies|a web-based, interactive system)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(a map|This information|movies)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.split('shall')[0].strip() for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*be\s*compatible\s*with\s*\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.split('compatible with')[1].strip() for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*be\s*compatible\s*with\s*\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.split('compatible with')[1].strip() for match in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*be\s*compatible\s*with\s*\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.split('compatible with')[1].strip() for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.split('shall')[1].strip() for match in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*be\s*compatible\s*with\s*\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.split('compatible with')[1].strip() for match in shared_phenomena]

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+ environment\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

- 'Software System': any noun phrase that refers to a software system or a system to be developed.
- 'Physical Device': any noun phrase that refers to a device in the real world, which can be used to get/send/receive data/information.
- 'Environment Object': any noun phrase that refers to an entity in the real world.
- 'External System': any noun phrase that refers to a manually designed domain that can store data messages.
- 'System Requirements': any noun phrase that refers to the aim and purpose of the system to be developed.
- 'Shared Phenomena': any noun phrase that refers to a set of shared events, states and values between the connected entities.

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\smonitor\b|\b\w+\scollector\b|\b\w+\sreader\b|\b\w+\sscanner\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
```python
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\susers\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif token.lower() in ['device', 'computer', 'hardware']:
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif token.lower() in ['patient', 'sun', 'old']:
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif token.lower() in ['require', 'need', 'shall']:
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif token.lower() in ['signal', 'time', 'power']:
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The system shall include digital programmable power switches which shall be used to monitor the current state of an appliance (e.g., a coffee maker is off or on)."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+operating\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+capable\s+of\s+(?:being\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+status\s+signals"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ devices\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ user\b', sentence)
    environment_objects += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ system\b', sentence)
    environment_objects += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ device\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ server\b', sentence)
    external_systems += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ interface\b', sentence)
    external_systems += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ system\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ shall\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ communicate\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ monitor\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ control\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b|\b\w+\sprocessor\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\srouter\b|\b\w+\sswitch\b|\b\w+\speripheral\b|\b\w+\smonitor\b|\b\w+\scontrol\b|\b\w+\scommunication\b|\b\w+\sconnection\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe\s\w+\b|\b\w+\senvironment\b|\b\w+\ssetting\b|\b\w+\scondition\b|\b\w+\sstate\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\sconnection\b|\b\w+\ssystem\b|\b\w+\ssoftware\b|\b\w+\sapplication\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\sneed\b|\b\w+\saim\b|\b\w+\sobjective\b|\b\w+\sfunction\b|\b\w+\sfunctionality\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\scommunication\b|\b\w+\sinteraction\b|\b\w+\srelationship\b|\b\w+\sconnection\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

This code defines a function `extract_entities` that takes a sentence as input and returns a JSON string containing the extracted entities. The function uses regular expressions to match the entities against the schema. The schema is defined as a dictionary where each key is an entity type and the value is a regular expression pattern. The function loops through each entity type, finds all matches using the regular expression, and adds the matches to the result dictionary. Finally, the function returns the result as a JSON string. The test case at the end of the code calls the function with a sample sentence and prints the result. 

However, the code has some issues. The regular expressions used in the schema are not accurate and may not match all possible entities. import re

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+the\s+ability\s+to\s+(.*)"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(2))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'the\s*\w+\s*shall\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) requirements'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) phenomena'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

Tokenize the input sentence into individual words or phrases.

Extract the entities that match the schema definition and return an empty list for non-existent entity types.

Return the extracted entities as a JSON string.

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical|Correlator|Space Fractions|EVLA Correlator|EVLA)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(thermostat|UPS|computer|watchdog|data terminal|AV)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(operator|user|patient|sun|old|time period)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(set|display|reboot|override|enter|signal|keep|provide|remain|used|planned|default|end|initiating|onset|desired|except|during|conditions|include|limits|airspeed|altitude|fuel|corresponding|button)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(signal|time remaining on backup power|LOL delay timer|LOL timer|frequency selection|automatic frequency selection|automatic data terminal control mode|Emission Control|Hazards of Electromagnetic Radiation to Ordnance|EMCON|HERO|AV preset limits|airspeed limits|altitude limits|fuel limits|temperature setting)\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Identify the entity types for each token in the sentence
    for token in tokens:
        for key, value in schema.items():
            if re.search(value, token):
                extracted_entities[key].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(extracted_entities)

# Test the function

```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall\s+(.*)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) generators|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) power sources'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) standards|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) guidelines'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) Publication|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) guidelines'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall\s+(.*)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) values|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) limits|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) time stamp information'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],

        'Shared Phenomena': []

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"any\s+(\w+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(\w+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(?P<software_system>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(?P<physical_device>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(?P<environment_object>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(?P<external_system>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(?P<system_requirements>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(?P<shared_phenomena>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(CCTNS|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Tactical Control System|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Each|each)\s+(computer|humidistat)\s+system\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(users|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(reboot|execute periodic Fault Detection/Location|provide adequate response times)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(messages|level of interaction|determination)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
```
```python
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\ssensor\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\b|\b\w+\soperator\b|\b\w+\suser\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\sfile\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bshall\s\w+\b|\b\w+\sbe\srequired\b|\b\w+\sneed\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\soccurs\b|\b\w+\schanges\b|\b\w+\sstatus\b|\b\w+\slevel\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'(\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|Tactical Control System|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Tactical Control System|AV|Payload|ADT|GDT)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(day|time|security breaches|security alarms|operator|LOL timer|mission plan|mission|periodic Fault Detection/Location|Normal Operations Mode|Training Mode|level of interaction|caution and warning diagnostic|acknowledgment|critical warning flags|AV|Payload|ADT|GDT|Tactical Control System|system|malfunction|disabling|display|faults|operator command|system acknowledgement and response|maximum delay time|second|SSS 559)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(execute periodic Fault Detection/Location|display a LOL timer to the operator initiating a LOL onset|notify the operator of all discrepancies found during the mission plan check|indicate successful completion of the mission plan check|provide the operator a caution and warning diagnostic|be required to enter an acknowledgment prior to disabling the display of critical warning flags|allow the operator to set the LOL delay timer(s) during mission planning|have a maximum delay time of 1 second|provide the day and time for which any security breaches occurred)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(a caution and warning diagnostic|level of interaction|security breaches|security alarms|critical warning flags|system acknowledgement and response|maximum delay time|second)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

        'Software System': [],
